sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

import { Box, Text, Heading, Button } from 'grommet';

const choiceView = ({ item, toggleUi }) => {
  return (
    <Box 
      background="accent-4" 
      align="center"
      height="100%" 
      width="100%" 
    >
      <Box 
        justify="around"
        align="center"
        height="85%"
        width="100%"
      >
        {/* TITLE TEXT */}
        <Box height="20%" justify="center">
          <Heading textAlign="center" size="small" level="3">
            You should try
          </Heading>
        </Box>
        {/* CHOICE INFORMATION */}
        <Box height="60%" width="100%">
          <Box height="50%" justify="end" align="center">
            <Heading color="light-1" size="medium" textAlign="center" level="2">{item.name}</Heading>
          </Box>
          <Box direction="row" height="50%" align="start" justify="center" gap="xlarge">
            <Text weight="bold">{item.title}</Text>
            <Text weight="bold">{item.distance}</Text>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        
        {/* TEXTO ABAJo */}
        <Box height="20%" pad="medium">
          <Text textAlign="center" weight="bold" size="small">
            You ran out of options, try again or tweak your custom search parameters
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>

      <Box height="15%">
        <Button 
          onClick={() => toggleUi('landing')} 
          label="Try again" 
          color="dark-1" 
          primary
        />
      </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default choiceView;
